clauses.title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to you
clauses.description: The Agreements can be updated at any time, including in a way that negatively affects user rights, without notifying before or after the changes.

case.text: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to you

clauses.title: Service can block or censor user communications
clauses.description: The service reserves the right, for any or no reason, to refuse to post or reject user communications.
clauses.clause_text: We also reserve the right to block web pages with demonstrably incorrect information, web pages of extremely poor quality and other particularly dubious web pages.

case.text: User-generated content can be blocked or censored for any reason

clauses.title: User logs are deleted after a finite period of time
clauses.description: Logs are text files containing some information about web visitors, such as user agents (showing for instance that you're connecting from Firefox for Android) and ip addresses (which reveal your approximate location). This case applies to Services that periodically delete their logs to prevent user sessions being tracked over time.
clauses.clause_text: For this purpose alone, we store the full IP address and a timestamp for a maximum of 96 hours.

case.text: Logs are deleted after a finite period of time

clauses.title: Your personal data is used for limited purposes
clauses.description: Your Personal Data is only used for the essential purposes of the Service, which are clearly defined on the Agreements. For instance, the Service won't abuse your data to deliver targeted advertisements to you or for marketing purposes.
clauses.clause_text:
We use this data exclusively for any queries and under no circumstances pass them on to third parties. Examples Max Mustermann, mail@example.com
Erika Musterfrau, erika_m@domain.de
  • Payment data The payment data will be used exclusively to process the donation and under no circumstances will be passed on to third parties.

case.text: Your personal data is used for limited purposes

clauses.title: The service does not share user information with third parties
clauses.description: Information collected from users by this service is not given to third parties.
clauses.clause_text:
Contact data This includes the name you provided (first and last name) and your e-mail address.
We only use this data to answer you and under no circumstances pass it on to third parties.

case.text: Your personal data is not shared with third parties

clauses.title: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is friendlier to user privacy protection.
clauses.description: The Terms are governed by the applicable laws of a jurisdiction known for protecting citizens privacy with strong data regulations. Usually contributors will need to explain in the Analysis view of each point linked to this Case why the jurisdiction is friendly to user privacy protection.
clauses.clause_text:
Site Notice SUMA-EV - Verein für freien Wissenszugang (e.V.)

Wikipedia-entry for the SUMA-EV

SUMA-EV Röselerstr. 3 D-30159 Hannover Deutschland/Germany

case.text: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is friendlier to user privacy protection.

clauses.title: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data
clauses.description: Users have the right to access personal data hold by the Service, correct it and/or permanently delete it. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.
clauses.clause_text:
Right to rectification and supplementation: In accordance with Art. 16 GDPR. If we have stored incorrect data about you, you can determine that they will be corrected. This also applies to missing components, here you have the right to supplement.
  • Right to deletion:
    • In accordance with Art. 17 GDPR
  • Right to restriction of processing:
    • In accordance with Art. 18 GDPR. For example, if you have asked us to erase or modify data about you, you may impose a processing ban on us for the time we need to do so. This is possible regardless of whether we ultimately change, delete, etc. the data in question.

case.text: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data

clauses.title: Your personal data will not be used for an automated decision-making
clauses.description: The service promises not to use your personal data for automated decision-making, including profiling.
clauses.clause_text:
We do not operate profiling – i.e.
the automatic creation of user profiles.

case.text: Your personal data will not be used for an automated decision-making

clauses.title: This service allows you to retrieve an archive of your data
clauses.description: Users can request a copy of the data collected through the services and infer from it the amount of personal information that is processed and stored by the Service. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.
clauses.clause_text:
We will send you as soon as possible, i.e.
within days, a full copy pursuant to Art.
15 (3) subparagraph 1 GDPR of the data stored about you or other data stored by us.
For this, we prefer the electronic way according to article 15 (3) subparagraph 3 GDPR.
For this we will save your e-mail address for the time of processing.
Please inform us if you want to have the information expressly in paper form.
<li>

case.text: You can retrieve an archive of your data

clauses.title: This service provides an onion site accessible over Tor
clauses.description: Tor is a software for anonymous communication that directs Internet traffic through an overlay network. Onion sites are only available through Tor browser and provide additional security and anonymity to users.

case.text: An onion site accessible over Tor is provided

clauses.title: A complaint mechanism is provided for the handling of personal data
clauses.description: The service provides users with contact information for an internal or external structure to lodge complaints. It also provides users with contact information for a higher data protection / privacy office in case the internal mechanism fails to satisfy the user.
clauses.clause_text: Right to appeal: In accordance with Art. 13 (2) d) GDPR you can complain about us to the data protection officer of the state of Lower Saxony.

case.text: A complaint mechanism is provided for the handling of personal data

clauses.title: The website is open-source
clauses.description: The code of the software is open-source and the users can have access to the source code.
clauses.clause_text:
MetaGer is transparent

MetaGer is transparent. Our source code is Quellcodefreely licensed and publicly available for all to see.

case.text: The service is open-source

clauses.title: This service offers a symbolic but nonbinding statement about a matter of opinion, ethics, society, or politics
clauses.description: If a service expresses a worldview antithetical to the user’s, that is a good signal that they should not use the service. Or conversely, if the service expresses an uncommonly-held belief that the user agrees with and thinks is relevant to the service-user relationship and/or important, they may wish to use that to choose between otherwise comparable services.
clauses.clause_text:
For maximum transparency, we list the information we collect from you and how we use it. The protection of your data is important to us and it should be you, too.
Please read this statement thoroughly. it is in your interest. Person responsible and contact person MetaGer and related services are operated by SUMA-EV, which is also the author of this statement. By "we" in this statement usually SUMA-EV is meant.
Our contact details can be found in our site notice. We can be reached by e-mail at office@suma-ev.de. Principles As a non-profit organization, we have committed ourselves to free access to knowledge. Since we know that free research is not compatible with mass surveillance, we also take privacy very seriously.

case.text: This service offers a symbolic but nonbinding statement about a matter of opinion, ethics, society, or politics

clauses.title: This service does not collect, use, or share location data
clauses.description: No location-based information is tracked by the service, so that it cannot be used or shared with third parties.
clauses.clause_text: • Location data: Will not be stored or shared.

case.text: This service does not collect, use, or share location data

clauses.title: The service provides a free help desk
clauses.description: The service can be easily contacted for questions or provides a support center at no extra cost.
clauses.clause_text: If there are any further questions or uncertainties, please feel free to use our contact form and ask us your questions!

case.text: A free help desk is provided

clauses.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements
clauses.description: The given text has a date that allows to know when it was last updated.
clauses.clause_text: This version of our Privacy Policy is dated 2018-05-24.

case.text: There is a date of the last update of the agreements

clauses.title: This service assumes no responsibility and liability for the contents of links to other websites
clauses.description: The service rejects any responsibility for the contents of other websites to which it links.
clauses.clause_text: Despite thorough content control we do not take responsability for any content of external links.

case.text: This service assumes no responsibility and liability for the contents of links to other websites

clauses.title: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics
clauses.description: Your personal data is used for statistics in a de-identified/aggregated form (i.e. not directly linked to a unique identity) to analyse trends, for research and for analytics.
clauses.clause_text: • We store some of these data non-personally for statistical purposes.

case.text: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics

clauses.title: Third parties are involved in operating the service
clauses.clause_text: A metasearch engine combines the results of several search engines and evaluates them again according to its own criteria.

case.text: Third parties are involved in operating the service

clauses.title: This service collects your IP address, which can be used to view your approximate location
clauses.clause_text:
When using our web search engine MetaGer via their web form or through their OpenSearch interface, the following data is generated: <ol>
<li> Internet protocol address

case.text: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location
